CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Emergency Procedure relative to Pediatric Treatment?
SRP.A: Emergency Procedure is {above} Pediatric Treatment in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Rehabilitation Therapy relative to Specialist Surgery?
SRP.A: Rehabilitation Therapy is {above} Specialist Surgery in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Specialist Surgery relative to Chronic Care Program?
SRP.A: Specialist Surgery is {above} Chronic Care Program in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total average treatment cost?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Preventative Screening}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total average treatment cost?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Standard Consultation}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Pediatric Treatment's minimum Average Treatment Cost in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Pediatric Treatment's minimum Average Treatment Cost is in {1996}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Standard Consultation's maximum Average Treatment Cost in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Standard Consultation's maximum Average Treatment Cost is in {1988}.

NC.Q: Between 1987 and 1992, did the total Average Treatment Cost experience a larger or smaller change than between 1996 and 1999?
NC.A: The change in total average treatment cost between 1987 and 1992 was {larger} than between 1996 and 1999.

NC.Q: Between 1994 and 1996, was the average total Average Treatment Cost higher or lower than between 1992 and 1993?
NC.A: The average total average treatment cost between 1994 and 1996 was {higher} than between 1992 and 1993.

NC.Q: Between 1993 and 1995, was the average total Average Treatment Cost higher or lower than between 1988 and 1993?
NC.A: The average total average treatment cost between 1993 and 1995 was {higher} than between 1988 and 1993.

NC.Q: Between 1994 and 1998, was the average total Average Treatment Cost higher or lower than between 1988 and 1991?
NC.A: The average total average treatment cost between 1994 and 1998 was {higher} than between 1988 and 1991.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Preventative Screening} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Chronic Care Program and Standard Consultation first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Chronic Care Program and Standard Consultation first exchanged leading positions in {1989}.
